name: SalGuyTalk
commands: Guy. Cavalier. I'll work no more or less than's needed.
Keeping it simple, I like it.
Thank you, finally... someone who gets me.|Those two live to fight, I fight to live, but they at least keep things interesting.
I see.|Anyway, I hope you're comfortable in this army.
It's fine. Well, not fine. But...|That's life... I guess.|Guy, by the way.
The boss is still here, at least.|Make sure she makes it at least...
She'd want us to stay.|Relying on luck... why, Pyk?|Though, at least Hyper's here...
Just, give me time. Oh, er, also... Guy. That's my name.
Guy, I promise to keep you safe!
I doubt it...|But, I guess I have to stay with you... Or else I have nobody.
source:
multi_add_portrait;Sal;Right;Guy;Left
if;game.check_alive('Pykroe') and game.check_alive('Hyper')
    speak;Guy;Guy. Cavalier. I'll work no more or less than's needed.
    speak;Sal;Keeping it simple, I like it.
    speak;Guy;Thank you, finally... someone who gets me.|Those two live to fight, I fight to live, but they at least keep things interesting.
    speak;Sal;I see.|Anyway, I hope you're comfortable in this army.
    speak;Guy;I'll sure try.
elif;game.check_alive('Pykroe') and game.check_dead('Hyper')
    speak;Guy;...
    speak;Sal;I'm so sorry... Your friend...
    speak;Guy;It's fine. Well, not fine. But...|That's life... I guess.|Guy, by the way.
    speak;Sal;If I can do anything...
    speak;Guy;The boss is still here, at least.|Make sure she makes it at least...
elif;game.check_dead('Pykroe') and game.check_alive('Hyper')
    speak;Guy;...
    speak;Sal;I'm so sorry... Your leader...
    speak;Guy;She'd want us to stay.|Relying on luck... why, Pyk?|Though, at least Hyper's here...
    speak;Sal;If I can do anything...
    speak;Guy;Just, give me time. Oh, er, also... Guy. That's my name.
    speak;Sal;Guy, I promise to keep you safe!
else
    expression;Guy;CloseEyes
    speak;Guy;...
    speak;Sal;I'm so sorry... Your friends...
    speak;Guy;...
    speak;Sal;If I can do anything...
    speak;Guy;I doubt it...|But, I guess I have to stay with you... Or else I have nobody.
    speak;Sal;...
end
multi_remove_portrait;Sal;Guy
remove_talk;Sal;Guy
